distinct

from tb_user
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: select b.user_id, b.log_name, b.user_password, b.nick_name, b.email_address, b.phone_number, b.user_avatar, b.user_gender, b.user_per_signature, b.user_place, b.user_birthday, b.gmt_create, b.gmt_modify, b.is_tag, b.is_del from tb_user a,tb_follow,tb_user b where a.user_id=follow_user_id and be_followed_user_id=b.user_id and a.is_del=false and b.is_del=false and tb_follow.is_del=false and a.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.user_id, a.log_name, a.user_password, a.nick_name, a.email_address, a.phone_number, a.user_avatar, a.user_gender, a.user_per_signature, a.user_place, a.user_birthday, a.gmt_create, a.gmt_modify, a.is_tag, a.is_del from tb_user a,tb_follow,tb_user b where a.user_id=follow_user_id and be_followed_user_id=b.user_id and a.is_del=false and b.is_del=false and tb_follow.is_del=false and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from tb_user where log_name = #{logName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_Del = false

select
from tb_user where nick_name like #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_Del=false Order by gmt_create desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from tb_user where nick_name like #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_Del=false
